title: Bug 6656 - Close button moves down when view resized smaller
OB: When a view like the Navigator is resized smaller on Linux running build 20011127, the tool items move below the label.
EB: These two tool items should stay on the same line as the label regardless of how small the view gets.
SR:
1. Open the Navigator view on Linux running build 20011127.
2. Resize the view to make it smaller.
3. Observe that the tool items move below the label.
